Player - Class in estimation.player
This class focus on all Player logic
Player(boolean) - Constructor for class estimation.player.Player

playerBid(Player, ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class estimation.game.GameState
This method sets the bids for the player
playerChooseCard(JLabel) - Method in class estimation.player.Player
This function tells the player to choose a card After a card is chosen, we will minus the card from his current hand of playing cards If the card chosen is invalid, show him his current hand of cards and tell him to choose a valid card If it is valid, minus the card from his current hand and return the chosen card.
